researchtable:imbued: This item cannot be used for research.
minecraft:mending: Repairs the item when you gain experience.
minecraft:unbreaking: Makes the item lose durability more slowly.
minecraft:blast_protection: Greatly reduces damage and knockback from explosions.
minecraft:fire_protection: Reduces fire damage and burning time.
minecraft:thorns: Damages attackers when they hit you.
minecraft:respiration: Lets you breathe underwater for longer.
minecraft:swift_sneak: Makes you move faster while sneaking.
minecraft:frost_walker: Freezes water beneath you and protects you from magma blocks.
minecraft:soul_speed: Makes you faster on soul sand and soul soil.
minecraft:fire_aspect: Sets targets on fire when you hit them.
minecraft:looting: Makes mobs drop more and better loot.
minecraft:channeling: Calls lightning when your trident strikes in a thunderstorm.
minecraft:loyalty: Makes the trident return after being thrown.
minecraft:riptide: Propels you forward when throwing a trident in water or rain.
minecraft:infinity: Shooting a bow no longer consumes arrows.
minecraft:flame: Makes arrows set targets on fire.
minecraft:piercing: Lets arrows pass through multiple targets.
minecraft:silk_touch: Makes blocks drop themselves when mined.
minecraft:density: Makes falling mace attacks hit harder.
minecraft:wind_burst: Launches you upward after a strong mace hit.
researchtableenchantments:safekeep: Keeps this armor when you die.
researchtableenchantments:dark_sight: Grants clear vision in the dark.
researchtableenchantments:aromatic: Makes animals follow you more eagerly.
researchtableenchantments:hot_pockets: Crouching dries wet sponges you hold.
researchtableenchantments:hypothermia: Sometimes weakens enemies that hit you.
researchtableenchantments:salamander: Makes moving through lava feel easier.
researchtableenchantments:evasive: Sometimes lets you ignore projectile damage.
researchtableenchantments:juggernaut: Prevents you from being knocked back.
researchtableenchantments:last_stand: Grants a brief burst of invulnerability when near death.
researchtableenchantments:featherweight: Stops you sinking into powdered snow.
researchtableenchantments:hiker: Lets you step up full blocks without jumping.
researchtableenchantments:lightstep: Avoids traps while you are sneaking.
researchtableenchantments:fire_mantle: Blocking can set attacking enemies on fire.
researchtableenchantments:harbinger: Surrounds you with a lingering omen.
researchtableenchantments:necrotic_aura: Twists nearby villager deaths into undeath.
researchtableenchantments:frost_aspect: Hits slow and chill your target.
researchtableenchantments:enlightened_hu: Sometimes grants extra experience from kills.
researchtableenchantments:critical_strik: Makes your critical hits deal more damage.
researchtableenchantments:leeching_strik: Heals you slightly when you land hits.
researchtableenchantments:extend: Slightly extends your reach with tools.
researchtableenchantments:mattock: Lets your pickaxe also act as a shovel.
researchtableenchantments:kiln_touch: Bakes sand and clay as you dig them.
researchtableenchantments:baited: Turns junk catches into better rewards.
researchtableenchantments:sow: Replants crops as you harvest them.
researchtableenchantments:water_strider: Freezes water beneath your horse as it walks.
researchtableenchantments:showjumper: Greatly increases your horse's jump height.
researchtableenchantments:botanist: Makes flowers drop in greater numbers.
researchtableenchantments:eternal_flame: Keeps furnaces burning without using fuel.
researchtableenchantments:voidtide: Lets Riptide work in the End.
